Author: sdkfslfsk
Text: This is tough to do, but thank you. I have to keep reminding myself of this daily

Author: gigi-has-issues
Text: I know you want to save your mom, but you can't. She has to want to get better herself. Let her know you love her and are always willing to listen and care for her, even when she's doing badly/relapsing. That your love is not conditional upon improvement.
